roleset.name: to make regular
roleset.note: REGULARIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'regularize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VerbNet. VN 45.4. Comparison with 'normalize.' (from regularize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The doctor regularized the heart beat with a pace maker.

roleset.name: uniform, consistent, having uniform intervals (temporal or spatial)
roleset.note: REGULAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from regular.01-j)

role.descr: specific aspect/activity of arg1 that is regular

example.name: regular-j: raised possessor as arg1, and arg2
example.text: he is regular with his bowel movements most days..

example.name: regular-j
example.text: Evaluation in the Emergency Department included an abdominal pelvic CT , and this revealed a 9 x 6 - cm regular mass in the sigmoid colon , numerous hepatic lesions

roleset.name: average, ordinary, of the norm
roleset.note: REGULAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl (from regular.02-j)

example.text: If it had expired, it was regular to proceed against the bail, because it might be waived ;
